Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-50609 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-50609 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package fluent-bit is earlier than 3.0.6-2, affected by CVE-2024-50609
